home.name: Margherita Pizza
home.description: A classic pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

home.name: Veggie Delight
home.description: Loaded with fresh vegetables including bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives, and tomatoes, all topped with mozzarella cheese.

home.name: Four Cheese Pizza
home.description: Featuring a blend of mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and gorgonzola cheeses for a rich and creamy flavor.

home.name: Spinach and Feta Pizza
home.description: A delightful pizza topped with fresh spinach, crumbled feta cheese, and mozzarella.

home.name: Mushroom Pizza
home.description: A savory pizza topped with saut√©ed mushrooms, mozzarella cheese, and fresh herbs.

home.name: Broccoli and Cheddar Pizza
home.description: A healthy pizza option topped with fresh broccoli florets, cheddar cheese, and mozzarella.

home.name: Artichoke Pizza
home.description: Topped with marinated artichokes, sun-dried tomatoes, and a blend of mozzarella and parmesan cheeses.

home.name: Eggplant Parmesan Pizza
home.description: A delicious pizza topped with breaded eggplant slices, marinara sauce, and mozzarella cheese.

home.name: Zucchini and Goat Cheese Pizza
home.description: Topped with thinly sliced zucchini, crumbled goat cheese, and mozzarella, finished with a drizzle of olive oil.
